description.name: Hetzner Server
description.short: Hetzner Server module enables bridge between your WHMCS instane with Hetzner Robot portal for ease of use and automation of servers.
description.long:
This module can be used to auto provisioning of Hetzner Server instances. 

This module supports the following actions at provisioning time:

* Auto placing order at Hetzner on Payment received
* Automatic Suspension/ Unsuspension/ Termination of the Server
* Supports Unlimited Hetzner Project accounts
* View Bandwidth Usages/ Rescue Mode Password
* Rebuild Server

 In all cases, in addition to the itemised action, it will also allow other automations such as Set Reverse DNS and many other features.

[Learn more »](https://www.license.co.id/whmcs-addons/whmcs-module/)
